I lobe Dr. Nicole. She's straight forward and funny and totally a comfortable person to talk to about anything.
great doctor

Dr. Simmons makes me feel comfortable and is always good at explaining treatments or questions.
She was extremely friendly and efficient. Job well done and it was a pleasant experience.

reviewDetails.comment:
I have known doctor Devito for over 20 years. Both my husband and I see him. 
He is very thorough and will explain in detail any procedures and medications prescribed. He makes you feel at ease and is professional and trust he will always follow up. I would recommend Dr. Devito to all my family and friends looking for an internist.
An amazing doctor that takes the time to speak to you and answer any question you may have at any time.

He is a great doctor; knows plenty; great bed-side manners; very thorough; takes the entire hour to talk to you, answer any questions, review notes from prior visits with respect to ailments, issues, etc. I would recommend this doctor.
Dr. Devito is a great doctor - thorough, knowledgeable, great at communicating important and relevant medical information, efficient. A treasure.

I am grateful that Dr Devito was willing to schedule a last minute video consultation (within a couple of hours of calling his office) when I tested positive for covid.  His advice and timeliness of setting up the video consultation were very much appreciated!
I have been Dr. Devito’s patient for more than 10 years and he is thorough, friendly, and well-informed. I would recommend him to anyone and everyone.
Dr. Devito is thorough and caring.  He listens thoroughly and makes good recommendations.
Dr. Devito is very thorough and takes time to discuss all relevant health topics and explains everything very well. Also appointment was on time.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Prezioso is an incredible pediatric doctor and a meaningful asset to any family's health.
very knowledge doc and diagnosis well.

Wonderful Physician.   Dr.  Prezioso was so great with our son,  it’s clear she loves children!  She listened to all of our concerns, and answered any questions thoroughly.  We never felt she was in a rush with us.  Highly recommend.

Easy to get an appointment with, short wait time, she spends time talking and asking lots of follow up questions, she does the shots herself, office is super clean, and forms are filled out and sent back quickly.

Dr. Prezioso has followed my children since birth. She has great insights, great advice. Dr. Prezioso always takes the time to listen to our concerns. My son Adam is now a teenager. We still travel 1 state to consult with her. The office staff at both locations are very nice and friendly.
Dr. Prezioso is a wonderful, warm pediatrician. She had great bedside manner and put my 8 year old at ease. Very knowledgeable.
Dr. Prezioso is amazing with our kids and with us and we would recommend her to anyone.
She is a great and wonderfully fabulous pediatrician, knowledgeable and the right balance for us on being diligent enough but yet not overbearing and overly cautious. She is also great with kids.
Dr. Prezioso is great- explains things clearly and is very reassuring to new parents. Super great with the kiddos too.

reviewDetails.comment: We've been seeing Dr. Motlow since my daughter was a baby, and she is calming, non-alarmist, and thorough.
Dr.Motlow is a terrific pediatrician.  She is calm, thorough, kind and takes the time to answer questions without being dismissive or condescending.
Great doctor who is practical and works very well with children and parents.

Dr Motlow is very warm and welcoming to both my kid and us as parents, she is always clear and thorough with her answers to our many anxious questions as first time parents, would definitely recommend.
Dr. Motlow is gentle and respectful with my children. She speaks to and listens to both parents and the child during visits and is reassuring and kind.  She provides detailed information and support.
I love Dr Motlow. She actually takes the time to listen and dont semed rush. She responds to your calls.
Dr. Motlow is a great pediatrician. Our family has been very happy with the care and advice she's giving both our kids.
Dr. Motlow is a fantastic physician with a professional and reassuring disposition.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Stern was great and easy to talk to.  Felt very comfortable and in good hands.
Dr Stern is friendly, interesting and a great listener. More importantly she is a great cardiologist who takes the time to explain your testing/evaluation and answer any questions.
I absolutely LOVED Dr. Stern. She has a great bedside manner and responded with my test results in record time. I feel my heart health is taken care with Dr. Stern as my health partner.
She was very knowledgeable, friendly and efficient.  I would highly recommend her and her entire office.
Dr. Stern is very smart and thoughtful and takes time speaking to her patients and explaining everything. She is a great doctor!
Dr. Stern is very attentive and caring and takes the time to explain your health situation in detail. She is friendly and easy to talk to and answers all of your questions.
She is an expert in her field yet she’s very approachable and attentive.  She has been my physician for more than 25 years.   She is amazing.
Dr. Stern listens, is thoughtful about me as an individual and considers my needs.
she listens.  addresses concerns.  friendly.

reviewDetails.comment: He is obviously expert, but also listened carefully to what I was concerned about and answered my questions fully.

I really just saw Dr Feldman for my annual colonoscopy (I am 61 with a family history on that front) and endoscopy, but I really like how he asks what my GP is doing and all the meds that I am on.  Though I view him as a specialist, he is trying to piece together all of the pieces and i really appreciate that.  Some specialists just stay in their silos.
I was just another person to him. Kind of cold.
Dr. Feldman is an amazing doctor who is thorough, patient, and gives you all the time you need to discuss treatments. I feel very well taken care of every visit.
good doctor
